bibl.title: Hy]c[ipyle. A Version for the Stage. <Hy]ps[ipyle>
Lost Dramas of Classical Athens. Greek Tragic Fragments
bibl.author: WILES, David

bibl.note: Text prepared for presentation to the annual conference of the Classical Association at Royal Holloway, University of London (RHUL), on 12 September 1997. Performance took place in the studio theatre of the Department of Drama, Theatre and Media Arts.
bibl.seg: WILES David, Hy]c[ipyle. A Version for the Stage. <Hy]ps[ipyle>
Fiona McHARDY, James ROBSON and David HARVEY (Edd.), Lost Dramas of Classical Athens. Greek Tragic Fragments (Exeter, 2005) pp. 189-207.
